title: Are You Out of Your Mind?
description: How do we know what we know? The brain is an amazing product of evolutionary engineering, but many influences can play with our perceptions.
author: feed@startalkradio.net (Neil deGrasse Tyson)
content:encoded: How do we know what we know? The brain is an amazing product of evolutionary engineering, but many influences can play with our perceptions.
